    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void battle()
      Method that calls for the player and the computer to each shoot their rockets on their given turns.
      static void compShoot()
      Method for the computer to shoot a rocket at a random position within the board that isn't where it placed its pieces If the computer hit a grenade on its previous turn, its turn will be skipped
      static boolean outOfBounds(int i, int j)
      Method to check if the index asked exists on the board or if its out of bounds
      static boolean outOfBounds(java.lang.String p)
      Method to check if the position asked exists on the board or if its out of bounds
      static void play()
      Method to play Battleship
      static void shoot(java.lang.String p)
      Method for the player to shoot a rocket at given position If the player hit a grenade on his previous turn, his turn will be skipped
      static Board startGame()
      Method to place the initial pieces to start the game Asks the player positions to place 6 ships and 4 grenades on the Hidden board

      • shoot

        public static void shoot(java.lang.String p)
        Method for the player to shoot a rocket at given position If the player hit a grenade on his previous turn, his turn will be skipped

      • compShoot

        public static void compShoot()
        Method for the computer to shoot a rocket at a random position within the board that isn't where it placed its pieces If the computer hit a grenade on its previous turn, its turn will be skipped

      • battle

        public static void battle()
        Method that calls for the player and the computer to each shoot their rockets on their given turns. Announces whether the player wins or loses
